{{Wireless embedded system |brand=OvisLink |model=WL-8000AP |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=10/20/2004 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=AboCom |manuf_model=WAP404 |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=access point |fcc_id=MQ4WAP404 |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=9 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Texas Instruments |cpu1_model=TNETW5306;TNETW5306PYP; |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu1_cores= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |cpu2_cores= |fla1=2 MiB |fla1_brand=Intel |fla1_model=TE28F160C3TD70 |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=8 MiB |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model=MT48LC4M16A2TG-7E |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial=yes,, internal,, 4-pin header,, populated |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Texas Instruments |wi1_chip1_model=TNETW1130 |wi1_chip2_brand=Radia |wi1_chip2_model=RC2422B |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand=Realtek |eth_chip2_model=RTL8201CP |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |addl_chips= |flags=schematics |stock_boot= |stock_os=VxWorks;5.4; |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=ovislink |default_ssid_regex=^ovislink$ |default_ip=192.168.1.252 |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=00:4F:62 |oui_eth=00:4F:62 |default_ch= }} This device would appear to be an [[AboCom WAP404]]. The FCC ID (+ addl. relevant data) of the WAP404 has been assigned to this entry.
==External links== *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=68652 Boot log on the '''DD-WRT''' Forums] :'''ovislink''' SSID referenced - presumed default, 00:4F:62 OUI, VLYNQ IF used to the ACX111 *[http://www.dostavka.ru/OvisLink-AirLive-WL-8000AP-id_5272659 Page on '''dostavka.ru''' w/ a board shot] :"M01-WAP44-A10" is silkscreened on the board, consistent w/ the WAP404. The serial header is populated.
